### LoweredTailCall {#af2f2b7bb59faa4dff3856ca66df4172c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::CallLowering::CallLoweringInfo::LoweredTailCall = false">
True if the call was lowered as a tail call.

This is consumed by the legalizer. This allows the legalizer to lower libcalls as tail calls.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00145">145</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.
